steps: Boil pasta. Sauté garlic in olive oil, add tomato sauce. Mix with cooked pasta.
Prepare sushi rice. Place on nori sheet, add fillings, roll tightly, and slice.
Marinate paneer and veggies in yogurt and spices. Grill or pan-fry until charred.
Cook rice. In a pan, temper mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chillies in oil. Add turmeric, salt, and lemon juice. Mix with rice.
